name: Rebutting Industry Science with Knowledge
goal:
R.I.S.K. Consultancy is incorporated in the state of Michigan, USA; as a non-profit corporation.

I, as R.I.S.K. Consultancy, advocate for reduction in petrochemical use, largely in the EU notably) but also in USA.

I try to lend my technical expertise in toxicology, epidemiology and chemical risk assessment to NGOs working towards the same goals. Occasionally I sign contracts to perform one-off tasks for NGOs, most of the time I work for free.
euInitiatives:
REACH-Registration, Evaluation & Authorisation of Chemicals Regulation;
PPPR–Plant Protection Products Regulation (pesticides);
BPR–Biocides Product Regulation.
